productDescription: List your equestrian product for sale or rent
basicInfoDescription: Start by providing the essential details about your product.
basicInfoTips: A detailed description helps potential buyers understand your product better. Include information about materials, dimensions, usage, and any other relevant details.
imagesCategoryDescription: Upload high-quality images and select the appropriate category for your product.
dragDrop: Drag and drop your product images here
noImagesAvailable: No images available for this product.
imageRequirements: Upload at least one image of your product (JPEG, PNG, or WebP, max 10MB)
imageTips: High-quality images can significantly increase your product's appeal. Ensure good lighting and show the product from different angles.
onlyImagesAllowed: Only image files (JPEG, PNG, WebP) are allowed
pricingDescription: Set your product's pricing information and availability.
stockNote: Leave blank if unlimited or not applicable
pricingTip1: Research similar products to set competitive prices
pricingTip2: Consider your costs and desired profit margin
pricingTip3: For rental items, ensure pricing reflects wear and maintenance
